#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
const int M=100005;
int n,m;
int a[M];
ll sum;
ll work(int pos) {
    if (pos >= n) return 0;
    return (a[pos] != a[pos+1]) ? 1LL * pos * (n - pos) : 0;
}
int main() {
    cin>>n>>m;
    for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) cin>>a[i];
    sum = 0;
    for (int i=1;i<=n;i++) sum += work(i);
    while (m--) {
        int t,x;cin>>t>>x;
        sum -= work(t);sum -= work(t+1);
        a[t]=x;
        sum += work(t);sum += work(t+1);
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
